data.title: It’s now illegal in Russia to share an image of Putin as a gay clown

Girls as young as nine are “physically and spiritually” ready for marriage, a Malaysian MP says, also claiming there’s “nothing wrong” with females marrying their rapists. It comes after Malaysia failed to criminalize child marriage in a recent law.

Lebanese Prime Minister: Lebanon at 'breaking point' due to refugees. Lebanon, a population of 5M, currently hosts more than 1M refugees, the world's highest refugee count per capita.
